meanings.sent1: The unfearing hero bravely faced the dragon.
meanings.sent2: She walked through the dark forest unfearing any danger.
meanings.sent3: The unfearing squirrel challenged the cat to a staring contest.
meanings.sent4: The unfearing sun rose above the horizon, banishing the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The unfearing child stood up to the bully, showing great courage.

meanings.sent1: The unfearing soldier marched into battle without hesitation.
meanings.sent2: Despite the storm, the unfearing captain steered the ship to safety.
meanings.sent3: The unfearing cat fearlessly chased the mouse around the house.
meanings.sent4: The unfearing mountain stood tall against the raging winds.
meanings.sent5: The unfearing firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the trapped family.
